channel.title: Lookup SID on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Lookup SID on TLDRBins

item.title: ADCS
item.description: Enum (From Linux) certipy-ad nxc # Password certipy-ad find -u '<USER>' -p '<PASSWORD>' -target <TARGET> -text -stdout -vulnerable # NTLM certipy-ad find -u '<USER>' -hashes '<HASH>' -target <TARGET> -text -stdout -vulnerable # Password nxc ldap <TARGET> -u '<USER>' -p '<PASSWORD>' -M adcs # NTLM nxc ldap <TARGET> -u '<USER>' -H '<HASH>' -M adcs Enum (From Windows) powershell certify ADCSTemplate # Check ADCS service net start | findstr /i cert # Check env certutil # List cert templates certutil -catemplates # Get info of each template .
